page_analyses.summary: This page is a resume for Trinh Binh Nguyen, an AI Engineer specializing in Natural Language Processing and Large Language Models. It highlights his education, extensive technical skills, and work experience with Innotech Vietnam Corporation, including roles as a Fresher AI Engineer and Intern AI Engineer.
page_analyses.detailed_content: The document is the first page of a resume, starting with the candidate's name and contact information, followed by a professional summary outlining their AI expertise. It then details their education at International University (IU) – VNU HCMC, including a B.Sc. in Data Science and GPA. A comprehensive list of technical skills is provided, categorized by area such as Programming, AI/NLP, Big Data & Cloud, Data Visualization, and Software Development. The page concludes with a detailed 'Work Experience' section, describing responsibilities and achievements in two roles at Innotech Vietnam Corporation, focusing on LLM optimization, context engineering, and chat-based coding applications.

responsibilities: Built multi-layer memory for InnoCody using LangChain's context-engineering patterns (write, select, compress, isolate) to deliver just-in-time context per agent step.
Implemented short-term state + checkpointing (LangGraph-style) and long-term semantic memory (temporal knowledge graph + graph-vector store) for cross-session recall.
Added selective retrieval (temporal subgraphs, persona/task-scoped pulls) and context compression (periodic summarization, post-tool compaction).
Context compression: periodic summarization + post-tool compaction to tame token-heavy outputs; preserved key decisions while cutting tokens/latency.

Upgraded and optimized the LLM server to handle user requests, implementing prompt-engineering strategies that improved response efficiency by 30% and reduced token consumption by 50%, resulting in both higher quality answers and lower latency.
Designed and implemented a checkpoint feature for the chat-based coding application, ensuring session persistence and rapid recovery.
Applied MCP server integration to further enhance response performance and reduce operational costs.

page_analyses.summary: This page details the applicant's professional experience, personal projects, academic achievements, and additional skills. It covers roles in NLP, data science, and AI instruction, along with advanced machine learning projects.
page_analyses.detailed_content: The page outlines professional experiences including an NLP role at Trolyhopdong.com, an upcoming Data Scientist internship at BA3, and a future Teaching Assistant position at International University. It then describes two significant projects: a Vietnamese Medical Question Answering system utilizing RAG and fine-tuned LLMs, and a Movie Recommendation System based on vector embeddings. The applicant also highlights an academic achievement, the 'Encouraging Study Award,' and lists language proficiencies (Vietnamese, English) and certifications (Machine Learning, Data Engineer). Many of the listed experiences and projects have future completion dates.
